column1: So you go in store and have a look at the devices. You see this S25 fe all new and shiny. The seller will approach and "assist" you in buying it. You buy it, all happy and sound. Then you wanna go somewhere and have a few videos and handful of snaps. It's a brand-new Samsung device after all... But sadly, it will drain its battery quickly and will be hot to hold. And then you are like... "It's 2025, and still phones are coming out with severe overheating issues and battery drain". Then you go back, return it and choose something well better for less money (plenty of options).
